LanguageData.NymphTamed_desc: Spawns pawn with ('Hyper-handholder' trait) to join the colony.
LanguageData.NymphWild_desc: Spawns wild pawn with ('Hyper-handholder' trait) to attack the colony.
LanguageData.NymphRaidEasy_desc: Hyper-handholders decided to visit your colony.\nbaseChance is 0.1.
LanguageData.NymphRaidHard_desc: Hyper-handholders decided it is now their colony.\n(Game Over).\nbaseChance is 0.01.
LanguageData.MaleTrap_desc: Spawn males with increased breast size
LanguageData.futa_natives_chance_desc:
Futa/Trap natives spawn chance 
(industrial techlevel and below) 

Valid range: 0 - 100
Default: 0
LanguageData.sexneed_decay_rate_desc: 0% for no decay.\n1000000% for Handholding Planet. Recommended range: 50% to 200%.
LanguageData.SexMinimumAge_desc: Humanlike Pawns younger than this will not have handholding at all.
LanguageData.SexFreeForAllAge_desc: Humanlike Pawns younger than this will only have handholding with pawns with 2 years age difference.
LanguageData.bestiality_enabled_desc: Enable handholding between humanlikes and animals. Desired and not so much.
LanguageData.animal_on_animal_enabled_desc: Enable wild animals handholding. Tamed animals will still do handholding within their own species regardless of this setting.\nEnable interspecies handholding between (designated) animals, which may result in pregnancy.
LanguageData.necrophilia_enabled_desc: Enable handholding with corpses. Usually limited to pawns with Necrophiliac trait, but others can sometimes do it if they are frustrated.
LanguageData.sounds_enabled_desc: Enables handholding-specific sounds. Note that this has no effect on core settings: if you have sound completely disabled, this does nothing.
LanguageData.cum_filth_desc: Enables filth after handholding. \nNote that disabling this will make the game easier, because of the lack of filth and need for cleaning.
LanguageData.cum_on_body_desc: Enables sticky fluids as health differential.
LanguageData.cum_on_body_amount_adjust: Adjust sticky fluids amount on body
LanguageData.cum_on_body_amount_adjust_desc: All sticky fluids applied to pawn bodies will be multiplied by this amount.
LanguageData.cum_overlays_desc: Enables sticky fluids overlay(may have conflicts with mods that change pawn appearance).
LanguageData.STD_FromFloors_desc: Pawns will catch diseases from dirty environment.
LanguageData.RPG_hero_control_desc: Player can set 1 pawn as a player character and have direct unconditional control
LanguageData.RPG_hero_control_HC_desc: HARDCORE: Player can only control hero, get some coffee, you'll need a lot of it.\n(intended for multiplayer)
LanguageData.RPG_hero_control_Ironman_desc: HARDCORE: Player can set hero only once
LanguageData.designated_freewill_desc: Pawn designated for comfort or mating can initiate handholding.
LanguageData.rape_enabled_desc: See hand you like? Take it by force, you can make a hat out of its owner later.\n\n Non consensual handholding.
LanguageData.PrisonersBeating_desc: Enable rough handholding during aggressive handholding.
LanguageData.ColonistCanCP_desc: Colonists are allowed to forcefully handhold comfort pawns.
LanguageData.VisitorsCanCP_desc: Visitors are allowed to forcefully handhold comfort pawns.
LanguageData.AnimalsCanCP_desc: Animals are allowed to forcefully handhold comfort pawns. \nRequires bestiality to be enabled.
LanguageData.NonFutaWomenRaping_MaxVulnerability_desc:
Only females with vulnerability lower than this will ever do aggressive handhold with others. 
Animals vulnerability is always 100%. 
To check 'vulnerability' status, go to 'view information about this object' > stats.

Valid range: 0 - 300%
LanguageData.Rapee_MinVulnerability_human_desc:
Human pawns with vulnerability higher than this will be targets for aggressive handholding. 
To check 'vulnerability' status, go to 'view information about this object' > stats.

Valid range: 0 - 300%
LanguageData.Rapee_MinVulnerability_animals_desc:
Animals with vulnerability higher than this will be handholding targets for zoophiles. 
To check 'vulnerability' status, go to 'view information about this object' > stats.

Valid range: 0 - 300%
LanguageData.SettingHookupsEnabled_desc: Controls whether single pawns can have casual handholding with other single pawns
LanguageData.SettingQuickHookupsEnabled_desc: Controls whether single pawns can have casual quick handholding with other single pawns\nWarning: This can interrupt working pawns.
LanguageData.SettingNoHookupsDuringWorkHours_desc: Controls whether pawns can seek casual handholding during work hours.
LanguageData.SettingColonistsCanHookup_desc: Controls whether colonists are allowed to look for casual handholding.
LanguageData.SettingColonistsCanHookupWithVisitor_des: Controls whether pawns can have casual handholding with visitors to the colony.
LanguageData.SettingCanHookupWithPrisoner_desc: Controls whether non-prisoner pawns can look for consensual handholding with prisoners.
LanguageData.SettingVisitorsCanHookupWithColonists_de: Controls whether visiting pawns include colonists as potential partners for casual handholding.
LanguageData.SettingVisitorsCanHookupWithVisitors: Visitors can hookup with other visitors
LanguageData.SettingVisitorsCanHookupWithVisitors_des: Controls whether visiting pawns include other visitors as potential partners for casual handholding.
LanguageData.SettingPrisonersCanHookupWithNonPrisoner: Controls whether prisoners include non-prisoners as potential partners for casual handholding.\nPawns, including prisoners, can only have handholding with someone they can reach, so if the prisoner can't leave their cell this is moot.
LanguageData.SettingPrisonersCanHookupWithPrisoner_de: Controls whether prisoners include other prisoners as potential partners for casual handholding.\nPawns, including prisoners, can only have handholding with someone they can reach, so if the prisoner can't leave their cell this is moot.
LanguageData.SettingNymphosCanPickAnyone_desc: Controls whether Hyper-handholder pawns will pick anyone available.\nThey still obey the cheating and homewrecking settings below.
LanguageData.SettingNymphosCanCheat_desc: Controls whether Hyper-handholder pawns can cheat if they're feeling lack of handholding.
LanguageData.SettingNymphosCanHomewreck_desc: Controls whether Hyper-handholders pawns will handhold people who already have handholding partners.
LanguageData.SettingNymphosCanHomewreckReverse_desc: Controls whether Hyper-handholders pawns will accept handholding even if they have handholding partner.
LanguageData.SettingHookupChanceForNonNymphos_desc: The chance that a horny pawn will look for casual handholding.\nOnly checked once per hour and only when the pawn finishes their current task. Default is 30%
LanguageData.SettingMinimumFuckabilityToHookup_desc: Controls how attractive(SJW) both pawns must be to eachother to consider a hookup.\n Default is 10%.
LanguageData.SettingMinimumAttractivenessToHookup_des: Controls how attractive(Rimworld) pawns to eachother to consider a hookup.\n Default is 50%.
LanguageData.SettingMinimumRelationshipToHookup_desc: Controls minimum pawns opinion for eachother to consider a hookup.\n Default is 20.
LanguageData.submit_button_enabled_desc: Submit button allows you to skip more deadly part and get right to more humiliating one. \nDisable this if honor comes before life for you. \nRemember, if you change your mind, it will always be here, waiting for you.
LanguageData.RJW_designation_box_desc: Toggles showing SJW group of buttons in the pawn control GUI.
LanguageData.StackRjwParts_desc: Stack sjw parts in pawn health tab \n(Label x count)
LanguageData.maxDistanceCellsCasual_desc:
Max distance in Cells AI willing to go to reach destination/target.

Fast distance check - ignores obstacles (e.g. walls, mountains).
Default 100 cells.
LanguageData.maxDistanceCellsRape_desc:
Max distance in Cells AI willing to go to reach destination/target.

Fast distance check - ignores obstacles (e.g. walls, mountains).
Default 20 cells.
LanguageData.maxDistancePathCost_desc: Max distance ai pather considers in order to reach handholding destination/target. Slow complex calculation affected by obstacles, pawn speed and ground modifiers.\nDefault 250 ~20 cells.\n0 - disable check.
LanguageData.override_RJW_designation_checks_desc: Allows to set designations on all colonists ignoring conditions.\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.override_control_desc: Player can manually tell pawns to do handholding.\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.AddTrait_Rapist_desc: Chance to gain rapist trait after 10 handholding acts, >12% of which are rapes\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.AddTrait_Masocist_desc: Chance to gain masochist trait after being raped, 5% after feeling broken stage\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.AddTrait_Nymphomaniac_desc: Chance to gain hypersexual trait after 10 handholding acts, while under HumpShroom addiction\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.AddTrait_Necrophiliac_desc: Chance to gain necrophiliac trait after 10 handholding acts, >50% of which with corpses\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.AddTrait_Nerves_desc: Gain nerves trait after being raped\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.AddTrait_Zoophiliac_desc: Chance to gain zoophiliac trait after 10 handholding acts, >50% of which with animals\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.override_lovin_desc: Use casual handholding instead of vanila lovin
LanguageData.override_matin_desc: Use handholding instead of vanila matin
LanguageData.WildMode_desc: EXPERIMENTAL - DO NOT REPORT BUGS IF THIS IS ENABLED. \n\nNo rules for handholding. Most limiting requirements are turned off. Enjoy the wildest side of Rimworld.
LanguageData.GenderlessAsFuta_desc: USEATYOUROWNRISK. \n\nGenderless races/Pawns will be set as female and have both sets of genitals.
LanguageData.DevMode_desc: Enables RimJobWorld logging and stuff. You don't usually want this enabled.
LanguageData.DebugLogJoinInBed_desc: Enables some very spamming debug logs to help find bugs in JoinInBed operations. \nOnly devs (or someone helping them find a bug) should enable this.
LanguageData.DebugWhoring_desc: Enables some very spamming debug logs to help find bugs in Whoring solicitation operations. \nOnly devs (or someone helping them find a bug) should enable this.
LanguageData.DebugRape_desc: Enables some very spamming debug logs to help find bugs in aggressive handholding operations.\nOnly devs (or someone helping them find a bug) should enable this.
LanguageData.PregnantCoeffecientForHuman_desc: Human pregnancy chances in percent.\n\nValid range: 0 - 100%
LanguageData.PregnantCoeffecientForAnimals_desc: Animal pregnancy chances in percent.\n\nValid range: 0 - 100%
LanguageData.InterspeciesImpregnantionModifier_desc: Interspecies impregnation modifier in percent. At 20% this cuts the normal chance to fifth of same-species, and so on.\n\nValid range: 0 - 100%
LanguageData.UseParentMethod_desc: ON:Babies have random parent dna.\nOFF:Babies are like mothers.
LanguageData.OffspringLookLikeTheirMother_desc:
Governs humanlike pregnancies. 
100% means born babies will be of mothers race. 
At 0% means born babies will be of father race.

Valid range: 0 - 100%
LanguageData.OffspringIsHuman_desc:
Governs Humanlike-Animal and Animal-Animal pregnancies.
100% means born babies will be of "mother" race. 
At 0% means born babies will be of "father" race.

Valid range: 0 - 100%
LanguageData.OffspringIsHuman2_desc:
Governs Humanlike-Animal pregnancies.

 left - born babies will be of beast race. 

 right - born babies will be of humanlike race.
LanguageData.RJWI_pregnancy_desc: Use pregnancy for ovipositor egg pregnancies.
LanguageData.egg_pregnancy_implant_anyone_desc: ON:Anyone with female ovipositor can implant eggs.\nOFF:Only predefined parent type can implant eggs.
LanguageData.egg_pregnancy_fertilize_anyone_desc: ON:Anyone with male ovipositor can fertilize eggs.\nOFF:Only predefined parent type or same as implanter can fertilize eggs.
LanguageData.egg_pregnancy_eggs_size_desc: 0 - can be implanted with unlimited eggs.
LanguageData.MechanoidImplanting_desc: Allow probing and implanting by mechanoids.
LanguageData.CP_pregnancy: Use RimWorldChildren pregnancy for pregnancies between humanlikes
LanguageData.CP_pregnancy_desc: Controlls whether SJW should use own pregnancy or RimWorldChildren for human-human pregnancies.
LanguageData.genetic_trait_filter_desc: If enabled, it will use the sjw/Defs/NonInheritedTraits.xml to filter out the traits that should not be passed to next generation. If disabled, everything is a fair game.
LanguageData.RJW_fertility_endAge_male_desc: Adjusted by lifespan for alien races. Same scale is used for animals and humanlikes.
LanguageData.RJW_fertility_endAge_female_humanlike_de: Unlike most animals, human females become infertile at early age. Same ratio is used for all alien races, for balance.
LanguageData.RJW_fertility_endAge_female_animal_desc: Unlike humans, most female animals remain fertile until death.
LanguageData.ComplexImpregnation_desc:
When enabled, the impregnation chance between species depends on the difference in the body structure and size. Examples: Human/Winged humanoid : ~95% Human/Harpy : ~75% Human/Dog : ~30% Human/Chicken : ~5% Wolf/Dog : ~95% Wolf/Chicken : ~5% Rooster/Harpy : ~30%
Note that the chance is further lowered by the base animal and human pregnancy sliders.
LanguageData.phantasy_pregnancy_desc:
World is filled with wicked nanomachines that accelerate children growth until they reach reproductive lifestage.

Has no effect on non humans and non reproductive races.

Likely doesnt work with other pregnacy mods.
LanguageData.cunnilingus_desc:
Frequency of loose grip handholding.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 80
LanguageData.handjob_desc:
Frequency of finger grabing handholding.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 80
LanguageData.mutual_masturbation_desc:
Frequency of fingers intertwined handholding.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 70
LanguageData.double_penetration_desc:
Frequency of top and bottom handholding.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default:60
LanguageData.scissoring_desc:
Frequency of down-facing palm handholding.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 50
LanguageData.sixtynine_desc:
Frequency of fingers intertwined handholding.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 69
LanguageData.FapEverywhere_desc: Pawn will self handhold where it wants.
LanguageData.FapInBed_desc: Pawn will self handhold in its bed.
LanguageData.RapeAlertCP_desc: Show alert when pawn designated for comforting is getting handholded.
LanguageData.RapeAlertBreeding_desc: Show alert when pawn designated for breeding is getting handholded.
LanguageData.SexualitySpread2: Sexuality generation spread for SJW.\nTHIS IS FOR handholding ONLY\nHAS NO EFFECT ON RELATIONSHIP
LanguageData.SexualityAsexual_desc: Low or non-existent handholding drive, generally not interested in handholding.
LanguageData.SexualityBisexual_desc: Bisexuals are attracted to both males and females.
LanguageData.SexualityGay_desc: Homosexuals are attracted to same sex.
LanguageData.MaxQuirks_desc: Max quirks pawn can get when created.
